item.title: Uber’s stock falls as record demand for rides fails to deliver the profit investors expected
item.description: Uber’s stock dropped toward a 10-month low Wednesday as a quarterly profit miss offset record user results.

item.title: The economy got off to a decent start in the new year. Businesses hope things get even better.
item.description: The largest part of the economy expanded again in January and pointed to decent growth early in the new year, as businesses grapple with the lingering...

item.title: Why AMD’s stock is diving toward its worst day in years after earnings
item.description: AMD’s beat wasn’t as strong as it seemed, and high operating expenditures also clouded a strong report.

item.title: Gold’s back over $5,000 and silver’s surging as well

item.title: Car sales sputtered during an icy January. Weather wasn’t the only problem for auto dealers and the U.S. economy.
item.description: Sales of new cars and trucks — a barometer for the economy — sank in January to the lowest level in three years after a major winter storm. Yet it cou...
